name: Double Barrel OG
description: Double Barrel OG offers a double shot of OG genetics as this hybrid combines White Fire OG with Raskalâ€™s OG Kush. Its dense, resin-packed buds give rise to flavors both sweet and sour, a pungent fusion of sweet lemons and fuel-drenched pine. This hybrid travels straight to the head, launching you into thick euphoric lucidity that lets you forget any heaviness in mind or body. As the acute effects settle, Double Barrel OG eases you into a motivated and functional buzz perfect for afternoon productivity.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Hungry, Sleepy, Uplifted, Headaches, Pain, Stress, Cramps, Inflammation, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Headache, Paranoid, Anxious
